text: Sorevnuya drug drugu, podvizaytes' dlya polucheniya proshcheniya ot Gospoda vashego, i raya, kotorogo prostranstvo ravno prostranstvu neba i zemli: on prigotovlen dlya tekh, kotoryye veruyut v Boga i Yego poslannikov. Takovy shchedroty Boga; on dayet ikh, komu khochet: Bog vladyka velikikh shchedrot
